item.title: 给fedora 21安装infinality补丁
item.description: ###在Fedora 21中安装 RPM: freetype-infinality-2.4.12-1.20130514_01.fc21.x86_64.rpm RPM: fontconfig-infinality-1-20120615_1.noarch.rpm 再安装gnome-tweak-tool来设置slight和rgb，安装包 RPM: gnome-tweak-tool 安装好后将提示(hinti
